goals.1: Storing all objects in the container.
goals.2: If there is a rigid object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a elastic object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: don't pick and place a box called bin
rules.2: when place a rigid objects in the bin, the soft objects must be in the bin before
rules.3: when a soft object in the bin at the initial state, out of the soft object and replace it into the bin
